item.title: The Hero's Journey - Cross the first threshold
The Hero's Journey - Call to adventure
item.description:
Academic is designed to give technical content creators a seamless experience. You can focus on the content and Academic handles the rest.

Highlight your code snippets, take notes on math classes, and draw diagrams from textual representation.

item.title: The Hero's Journey - An Ordinary World
item.description: In this series of blog posts I will attempt to analyze my journey based on the hero myth pattern popularized by Joseph Campbell, which was influenced by Carl Jung's work on myth and archetypes also known as the ancient patterns of personality that are the shared heritage of the human race. In other words, the hero's journey represents the universal human condition of being born into this world, growing, learning, struggling to become an individual, and dying.
